synopsis.text: In the rural town of Fuchigamori, humans and youkai live together in harmony. However, strange events occasionally disrupt the tranquility. When the old cat Buchio mysteriously transforms into a nekomata, he sets out to uncover the reason behind his metamorphosis. Together with his friend Yuri, a transforming kitsune, Buchio explores the mysteries surrounding youkai transformations. Meanwhile, Muu-chan begins viewing the resident tengu Jirou in a new light after observing his tengu duties around town. At the same time, troubling rumors swirl about an unfortunate nue plaguing the area. Though daily life continues on calmly for the human and youkai residents, Buchio's transformation signals that darker supernatural forces may be awakening in Fuchigamori.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
